radiographic_examinations.findings: Atrial fibrillation with a rapid ventricular response.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Nonspecific ST-segment changes noted during an admission for near syncope.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Left atrial and left ventricular dilatation, low-normal left ventricular ejection fraction, mild left ventricular hypertrophy.
Average heart rate of 65 beats per minute, maximum heart rate of 84 beats per minute, no episodes of atrial fibrillation detected.
Atrial fibrillation correlated with symptoms reported by the patient.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated a close temporal correlation between reported episodes of anxiety and atrial fibrillation.
